name: Bomb Gear
description:
Hey, I was walking past a mall kiosk and was sold a cart I was promised was completely legitimate.

As far as I can tell it only really works with a controller?

Instructions:
F - Fullscreen
A - Confirm
Select - Reset

Game 1:
RT - Shoot
Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Aim

Game 2:
Left Stick - Move
A - Jump

Game 3:
Left Stick - Angle plane
A - Accelerate

Game 4:
A - Shoot
